Chicago.name: Art Institute of Chicago
Chicago.description: The Art Institute of Chicago is one of the world's premier art museums, boasting an extensive collection of artwork ranging from Impressionist masterpieces to contemporary exhibits.

Chicago.name: Willis Tower Skydeck
Chicago.description: The Willis Tower Skydeck offers breathtaking views of Chicago and beyond from its 103rd floor, featuring The Ledge, a glass balcony extending four feet outside the building.

New York.name: Central Park
New York.description: Central Park is the green heart of New York City, offering a peaceful mixture of lakes, forests, and trails. It's a hub for outdoor activities, culture, and relaxation.

New York.name: Statue of Liberty
New York.description: A symbol of freedom and democracy, the Statue of Liberty stands proudly on Liberty Island and offers tours, a museum, and breathtaking views of the New York City skyline.

New York.name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
New York.description: The Met is a world-renowned art museum, housing over two million works of art from ancient history to modern times.
